meta.title: Sakan Alsayd - Fully Furnished Student Housing in Saudi Arabia
meta.description: Fully furnished and serviced housing for female students and working women in the best neighborhoods across Saudi Arabia. Single, double, and triple rooms with all services included.

hero.title: Your Home
hero.subtitle: Fully furnished and serviced housing for female students and working women in the best neighborhoods across the Kingdom
hero.tagline: Among Your Family and Loved Ones

about.description: Sakan Alsayd serves all expatriate women, whether from within the Kingdom or abroad. We provide serviced housing - fully furnished apartments equipped with all appliances, offering many services including:
about.service1: Supervision of residents and meeting their needs and welcoming them
about.service2: Cleaning of the building and its facilities.
about.service4: Free transportation (to supermarket, pharmacy, library, shopping malls)
about.visionText: With distinguished ambition reaching for the horizon, supported by the expertise of a qualified team characterized by effectiveness and focus on achieving goals, with extensive experience and broad knowledge. Sakan Alsayd launched for female students and employees from the Eastern Region and beyond, to support and help girls inside and outside the Kingdom to establish a conscious generation of ambitious young women.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Answers to the most common questions

documents.question: What documents are required for registration?
documents.answer: You must present your National ID or Iqama (residence permit) when checking into the housing.

checkInOut.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
checkInOut.answer: Check-in time for receiving the housing unit is from 11 AM to 4 PM, and check-out is by 4 PM maximum.

visitors.question: Can I receive visitors?
visitors.answer: Visits are allowed from 1 PM to 8 PM, subject to obtaining permission and written approval from the branch supervisor.

holidays.question: What about holidays and vacations?
holidays.answer: The contract runs for the full period. During annual vacations, the housing unit must be vacated, and upon return, subscription is renewed based on available vacancies.

deposit.question: How does the deposit system work?
deposit.answer: A deposit of 500 SAR is required as a prerequisite for receiving the housing unit. The deposit is fully refunded upon final checkout and handing over the unit in good condition with the housing card and keys.

transport.question: Is university transportation available?
transport.answer: Yes, transportation to Princess Nourah University is available at specific times. You can subscribe per semester for 2,250 SAR or 1,900 SAR for upfront payment.

included.question: What does the rent include?
included.answer: The rent includes: high-speed internet, electricity, water, cleaning service for shared areas, and new bedding and pillow for each resident.

smoking.question: Is smoking or shisha allowed?
smoking.answer: Smoking and shisha are strictly prohibited inside the building and all its facilities. This is to ensure the health and safety of all residents.

pets.question: Are pets allowed?
pets.answer: Pets are not allowed inside the housing to maintain cleanliness and comfort for all residents.

storage.question: Is luggage storage available?
storage.answer: Yes, each resident can store 2 boxes for free. Any additional box costs 5 SAR per month.

cleaning_service.question: Is room cleaning service available?
cleaning_service.answer: Yes, optional cleaning service is available: 15 SAR/hour for rooms, and 10 SAR/hour for residential units.

ejar.question: Is the contract registered on the Ejar network?
ejar.answer: Yes, the contract is registered on the Ejar electronic network at a fee of 2.5% of the contract value.

faq.termsNote: By booking, you agree to the full terms and conditions
